import MethodEndpoint from '@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint';
import ParamsDetails from '@theme/ParamsDetails';
import RequestSchema from '@theme/RequestSchema';
import StatusCodes from '@theme/StatusCodes';
import OperationTabs from '@theme/OperationTabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import Heading from '@theme/Heading';

<Heading
  as={'h1'}
  className={'openapi__heading'}
  children={'postApiV1Snapshots:username:slug'}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'post'}
  path={'/api/v1/snapshots/{username}/{slug}'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

Create a new snapshot for a document in the project

<Heading
  id={'request'}
  as={'h2'}
  className={'openapi-tabs__heading'}
  children={'Request'}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      schema: { type: 'string' },
      in: 'path',
      name: 'username',
      required: true,
    },
    { schema: { type: 'string' }, in: 'path', name: 'slug', required: true },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={'Body'}
  body={{
    content: {
      'application/json': {
        schema: {
          type: 'object',
          properties: {
            documentId: {
              type: 'string',
              example: 'doc-456',
              description: 'Document ID',
            },
            name: {
              type: 'string',
              minLength: 1,
              maxLength: 255,
              example: 'Chapter 1 Draft',
              description: 'Snapshot name',
            },
            description: {
              type: 'string',
              maxLength: 1000,
              example: 'First draft of chapter 1',
              description: 'Snapshot description',
            },
            yDocState: {
              type: 'string',
              example: 'base64encodedstate...',
              description: 'Base64 encoded Yjs document state',
            },
            stateVector: {
              type: 'string',
              example: 'base64vector...',
              description: 'Base64 encoded state vector',
            },
            wordCount: {
              type: 'number',
              example: 1250,
              description: 'Word count',
            },
            metadata: {
              type: 'object',
              additionalProperties: {},
              example: { version: 1 },
              description: 'Additional metadata',
            },
          },
          required: ['documentId', 'name', 'yDocState'],
          title: 'CreateSnapshotRequest',
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '201': {
      description: 'Snapshot created successfully',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              id: { type: 'string', example: 'snap-123' },
              documentId: { type: 'string', example: 'doc-456' },
              name: { type: 'string', example: 'Chapter 1 Draft' },
              description: {
                type: ['string', 'null'],
                example: 'First draft of chapter 1',
              },
              wordCount: { type: ['number', 'null'], example: 1250 },
              metadata: {
                type: ['object', 'null'],
                additionalProperties: {},
                example: { version: 1 },
              },
              createdAt: {
                type: 'string',
                format: 'date-time',
                example: '2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z',
              },
            },
            required: ['id', 'documentId', 'name', 'createdAt'],
            title: 'DocumentSnapshot',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '400': {
      description: 'Invalid input data',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: { type: 'string', example: 'An error occurred' },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '401': {
      description: 'Not authenticated',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: { type: 'string', example: 'An error occurred' },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '403': {
      description: 'Access denied - not project owner',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: { type: 'string', example: 'An error occurred' },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '404': {
      description: 'Project not found',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: { type: 'string', example: 'An error occurred' },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
